title: Configure default hours and availability mode Snapshot

view.title: Configure default hours and availability mode
view.subtitle: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

blocks.title: Owner Configure Hours completed
blocks.message: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Create an offer representing the UC primary service; choose execution mode matching the scenario.
data.expectedResult: Offer is created in draft state with captured id.

data.instruction: Create at least one host resource and one non-host resource (asset or venue) suitable for the UC.
data.expectedResult: Resources are created with expected type, location, and buffers.

data.instruction: Execute advanced payment path (split tender and/or tip/gift/credit entitlement usage) and persist allocation evidence.
data.expectedResult: Payment trace clearly links payer, tender mix, and booking/order amounts with no ambiguity.
